original_text: A person can give a young bull as a burnt offering. This may be a special sacrifice that he has promised to give to God. Or it may be a friendship offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 번제로나 서원을 갚는 제사로나 화목제로 수송아지를 예비하여 여호와께 드릴 때에는

sentences.original_text: A person can give a young bull
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람은 어린 수소를 바칠 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: This may be a special sacrifice
that he has promised to give to God
Or it may be a friendship offering
